title: Bug 9619 - Move static member: Dialog details
description:
Bug 9619 - Move static member: Dialog details 20020212a. Mnemonics
b. No validation on the type field. Type existence is not too expensive (done in the type wizard for the superclass), so it could be done.
At least isValidTypeNamef. label could say 'Select destination type:'
g. Browse button is too small (use SWTUtil for standard button sizes)
c. Title is used for long text. When going to the next page, it says 'Type not found'
Only types from the source folders of the own project should be shown in the dialog.
e. Destination type can be source type: refactoring warns that this will result in errors (which is not true) and makes pseudo changes in all referencing classes.
OB:
Browse button is too small.
When going to the next page, the dialog says 'Type not found'.
Only types from the source folders of the own project should be shown in the dialog.
Destination type can be source type: refactoring warns that this will result in errors (which is not true) and makes pseudo changes in all referencing classes.
SR:
To reproduce:
1. Open the dialog.
2. Observe the size of the browse button.
3. Proceed to the next page and observe the displayed message.
4. Check if only types from the source folders of the own project are shown in the dialog.
5. Test if the destination type can be set as the source type and verify if any warning or pseudo changes occur.
